item.title: A Surging Hard Right in Europe Stumbles Over Its Own Divisions
item.description: The European Union is facing a crisis of legitimacy, with the rise of populist, nationalist parties that are challenging the very foundations of the bloc. These parties, which have gained significant ground in recent years, are united by their opposition to immigration, their skepticism of globalization, and their rejection of the EUâ€™s institutions and values.
